metadata.title: {name} | Portfolio
metadata.description: Explore my portfolio to see my work in design, web development, and more. I highlight my experience and skills to create incredible solutions.

hero.title: Hey, my name is
hero.subtitle: I'm a
hero.description: Exploring the boundaries of technology to solve real-world problems. From creating applications to process automation, my approach is driven by the passion for problem-solving and the desire to make a difference.

about.title: About Me
about.first-paragraph: Hello, my name is Brenno, as mentioned earlier, and I am 24 years old. I reside in the interior of Goiás and am currently studying Information Systems at the Federal Institute of Goiás.
about.second-paragraph: Since I was 11 years old, when I had my first computer, I have been passionate about Information Technology. This passion is so intense that when faced with a problem, I immediately think of how to solve it using some technological solution.
about.third-paragraph: I started studying programming at the end of 2021, watching online videos. In 2022, I enrolled in college to gain a deeper knowledge of programming and also to connect with people who share the same passion for technology.
about.fourth-paragraph: Since then, I have been doing freelance work and personal projects in the areas of design, web development, and process automation.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Check out some of my most recent projects.
